summary: Frontend testing completed for SellerCloudX 2026 Pricing Model. All requested features verified: Landing page shows correct 2026 pricing ($499/mo + $699 setup + 4% revenue share), Individual tariff displays SHAXSIY price with $1599+ setup and 2% commission, 60-day guarantee and 7-day free trial badges visible, Navigation working (Imkoniyatlar, Narxlar, Blog), Registration button working, Login dropdown showing Hamkor/Admin options. Trend Hunter API /api/trends/top returns real AliExpress data. One issue found: Blog page shows error 'posts.filter is not a function' due to missing blog_posts table in database.

minor.issue: Returns error 'no such table: blog_posts' - SQLite table not created

ui_bugs.issue: Shows error 'posts.filter is not a function' because API returns error object instead of array
ui_bugs.root_cause: Backend /api/blog/posts returns {success: false, error: 'no such table: blog_posts'} instead of array

action_items: Create blog_posts table in SQLite database or handle API error gracefully in BlogPage.tsx
critical_code_review_comments: 2026 Pricing Model correctly displayed: Premium $499/oy + $699 setup + 4% savdodan
Individual tariff shows SHAXSIY price with $1599+ setup and 2% dan boshlab
60-kun kafolat and 7-kun bepul sinov badges visible in pricing section
Trend Hunter API /api/trends/top returns real product data from AliExpress
Navigation links (Imkoniyatlar, Narxlar, Blog) all working
Login dropdown shows Hamkor Kirish and Admin Kirish options
Registration page (/partner-registration) loads correctly with form fields
BlogPage.tsx line 80 assumes posts is array but API may return error object

success_rate.frontend: 90% (6/7 features working, Blog page has error)
